args.natural_language_statement:
Let f : ‚Ñù^n ‚Üí ‚Ñù be C^2 with H_f continuous on a convex set U. Show that the second-order Taylor expansion is uniform on compact subsets of U.

Formalize a theorem stating that if f : (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù) ‚Üí ‚Ñù is twice continuously differentiable on a convex set U, then for every compact set K ‚äÜ U one has

sup_{x ‚àà K, h : Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù, x+h ‚àà U, h ‚â† 0} | f(x+h) - f(x) - ‚ü®‚àáf(x), h‚ü© - 1/2 ‚ü®h, D^2 f(x) h‚ü© | / ‚Äñh‚Äñ^2 ‚Üí 0 as h ‚Üí 0,

i.e. the remainder is o(‚Äñh‚Äñ^2) uniformly for x ‚àà K.

Translate into Lean4 syntax using Mathlib identifiers where available. End the statement with := by sorry.

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Set Filter

/-- Let f : ‚Ñù^n ‚Üí ‚Ñù be C^2 with H_f continuous on a convex set U. Show that the second-order Taylor expansion is uniform on compact subsets of U.

If f : (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù) ‚Üí ‚Ñù is twice continuously differentiable on a convex set U, then for every compact set K ‚äÜ U one has

sup_{x ‚àà K, h : Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù, x+h ‚àà U, h ‚â† 0} | f(x+h) - f(x) - (fderiv ‚Ñù f x) h - 1/2 * ((fderiv ‚Ñù (fderiv ‚Ñù f) x) h) h | / ‚Äñh‚Äñ^2 ‚Üí 0 as h ‚Üí 0,

i.e. the remainder is o(‚Äñh‚Äñ^2) uniformly for x ‚àà K. -/
theorem uniform_taylor_on_compacts (n : ‚Ñï) (f : (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù) ‚Üí ‚Ñù)
  {U K : Set (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù)} (hU : Convex ‚Ñù U) (hK : IsCompact K) (hsub : K ‚äÜ U)
  (hcont : ContDiffOn ‚Ñù 2 f U) :
  ‚àÄ Œµ > 0, ‚àÉ Œ¥ > 0, ‚àÄ x ‚àà K, ‚àÄ h : Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù, x + h ‚àà U -> h ‚â† 0 -> ‚Äñh‚Äñ < Œ¥ ->
    (|f (x + h) - f x - (fderiv ‚Ñù f x) h - (1 / 2) * ((fderiv ‚Ñù (fderiv ‚Ñù f) x) h) h|) / ‚Äñh‚Äñ ^ 2 < Œµ := by sorry

args.content:
import Mathlib

open Set Filter

/-- Let f : ‚Ñù^n ‚Üí ‚Ñù be C^2 with H_f continuous on a convex set U. Show that the second-order Taylor expansion is uniform on compact subsets of U.

If f : (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù) ‚Üí ‚Ñù is twice continuously differentiable on a convex set U, then for every compact set K ‚äÜ U one has

sup_{x ‚àà K, h : Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù, x+h ‚àà U, h ‚â† 0} | f(x+h) - f(x) - (fderiv ‚Ñù f x) h - 1/2 * ((fderiv ‚Ñù (fderiv ‚Ñù f) x) h) h | / ‚Äñh‚Äñ^2 ‚Üí 0 as h ‚Üí 0,

i.e. the remainder is o(‚Äñh‚Äñ^2) uniformly for x ‚àà K. -/
theorem uniform_taylor_on_compacts (n : ‚Ñï) (f : (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù) ‚Üí ‚Ñù)
  {U K : Set (Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù)} (hU : Convex ‚Ñù U) (hK : IsCompact K) (hsub : K ‚äÜ U)
  (hcont : ContDiffOn ‚Ñù 2 f U) :
  ‚àÄ Œµ > 0, ‚àÉ Œ¥ > 0, ‚àÄ x ‚àà K, ‚àÄ h : Fin n ‚Üí ‚Ñù, x + h ‚àà U -> h ‚â† 0 -> ‚Äñh‚Äñ < Œ¥ ->
    (|f (x + h) - f x - (fderiv ‚Ñù f x) h - (1 / 2) * ((fderiv ‚Ñù (fderiv ‚Ñù f) x) h) h|) / ‚Äñh‚Äñ ^ 2 < Œµ := by sorry
